channel.title: Pages on ewenme
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on ewenme

item.title: Projects
item.description: Software ghibli: Studio Ghibli colour palettes for R fplR: R package for working with Fantasy Premier League (FPL) data Web Applications polMonitor: Shiny app for monitoring police violence Vinylspotting: Shiny app for Discogs users to visualise and explore their record collections Other Work Who Got The Assist? (WGTA): Writing for the WGTA website

item.title: About
item.description: Ewen (pronounced you-n). Advocating for open source software and open science. Sharing stories about my diverse excursions in data science. Otherwise, you can find me listening to weird ‘n’ dusty records and sinking into a Discogs rabbit-hole.
